articles.title: Pd and Audio Programming in the 21st Century

title: burrow~
description: The `burrow~` object performs cross-filtering on an audio input, using a second audio input as a filter source. It operates based on FFT information, allowing for dynamic filtering controlled by parameters like frequency, threshold (in dB), and a multiplier factor. It supports both normal and inverted filtering modes and can be configured with window size and overlap for its FFT analysis.
